item.title: Commodities Weekly Report
item.description: ข่าว: In Tokyo, as crude and heating oil futures fell at the Tokyo Mercantile Exchange on surprisingly large stocks builds, gasoline futures diverged in late trade, posting moderate gains on worries about tight supplies just ahead of the peak summer driving season.

item.title: Seminar on Customs and Trade Laws
item.description: As a registered user of the Global Trade Portal, Bank NEOMA Global Trade Services is proud to invite you to this seminar on international customs and trade laws in 2002. Register today to this unique event.

item.title: Special Report on Business in Korea
item.description: The Korean economy is likely to pull out of its slump during the first quarter of the year, helped along by an upturn in consumption and exports, the Bank NEOMA International Research Institute says in this monthly report.

channel.title: Registered News from Bank NEOMA
channel.description: Registered Newsfeed from Bank NEOMA Trade Services Department
